title: Former Uber Security Chief Joe Sullivan Found Guilty of Hiding Hack From Authorities
description: A jury found Joe Sullivan, who led security at the ride-hailing company, guilty on two different counts. The case could change how security professionals handle data beaches.

title: Can Car-to-Car Communication Technology Save Lives?
description: A system called C-V2X — cellular vehicle-to-everything technology — will allow vehicles to communicate with each other, with a goal to save lives in the process.

title: Whatever Happened to Those Self-Service Passport Kiosks at Airports?
description: More than 80 percent of all travelers entering the U.S. are now verified by facial recognition. The loss of older, seemingly more convenient methods has many perplexed. And then there are the privacy issues.

title: Elon Musk’s Twitter Will Be a Wild Ride
description: His deal to buy the company is back on. Here are six predictions about Twitter under Musk’s control, if it happens.

title: Election Software Executive Arrested on Suspicion of Theft
description: The executive, Eugene Yu, and his firm, Konnech, have been a focus of attention among election deniers.
